summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Main Street from a point 100 feet East of 12th Avenue South to 20th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 12945, creating Local Improvement District No. 1170 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
